column4: Fixed the autosave feature only saving when a leerling was added. Now saving when confirming changes and adding leerling manually. Changed Refresh rate default value from 500 to 300.
FIX smartschool.cs changed the way apollon sends keys made the program continue when a lln is not found on page
Added Information labels Added "Andere" Reden to put an edited "Reden"

Fixes and additions [Fixes] - Fixed https://github.com/Kaminiix/Apollon/issues/9 - Fixed the leerling class having the sent prop to true by default - Renamed the main window from TestCam to Main - Fixed the smartschoolform not wanting to be opened again once closed - Fixed the setting button function name from PictureBox3 to btnSettings And minor fixes [Added] - Some icons - Added a way to save or undo changes when something is changed in the datagridview - Made the smartschoolForm load the leerling in datagridview when the form is loaded - Minor Visual changes
Implemented web automation ! STILL NEEDS TESTING !

Manual adding of leerlingen and minor fixes [Main.cs] Added a way to manually add a leerling Start and Stop buttons because they were'nt used anymore [leerling.cs] Made the leeling ID's in lowercase Made the leerlingen have a default reden
Edit GUI -[Add] images for buttons -[Edit] Background color -[Edit] Grid propreties
Misc changes [UI]  - Updated  2 icons to have a little animation  - Added Time to the DataGridView
Fixes - Fixed the program not closing correctly. - Fixed a bug where the webcam would still be used after the program closed. - Made the path to reden.txt not hardcoded anymore
Edit GUI -[Edit] GUI from SettingsForm -[Edit] Load.png/PowerBtn.png/PowerBtnRotated.png/Save.png/SettingsBold.png from grey to white color
Edit GUI -[Edit] GUI from MainForm -[Add] Panels behind buttons -[Edit] Change font of "lvlResult" and "lblComment" to white
Added Reden - Added a way to change the path in the settings - Added a listbox of reden imported from txt file [To do] - Make the path to the txt file not hardcoded

Added reden and code optimisation [Main.cs]  - Made the code more compact about 50 lines of code less  - The save path isn't hardcoded anymore and can be modified by user  - Added a statusStrip with progressbar and Errorlabel  - Added a reden to each leerling in the datagrid  - Updated program to write and import the new reden aswell  - Minor visual changes [Settings.cs]  - The program will now show a folder browser to the user when the user choses to enable the autosave mode  -  Minor visual changes [leerling.cs]  - Added a reden propertie for each leerling [Apollon]  - changed the project properties to have our icon as application icon when published
User can't close the settingswindow without confirming. which used to make the program crash
Added animations for buttons -[Add] animation for Load
minor ui changes And added this request https://github.com/Kaminiix/Apollon/issues/2 And Renamed the solution to Appolon.sln
Added Dev mode: -[Add] Dev mode -[Rename]  rename solution "TestCam" to "Appolon"

Added Saving to json [Added] - Made a save Button that saves the data to data.json - Made a autosave function to save data in case the program crashes - Made a load button to load the data from an autosave file - Added some icons
code improvement [Code main.cs] - replaced for loops with foreach's for readability - removed some clutter comments
GUI Update MainForm: delete useless "Take picture" button
Fix crash when no camera is selected.

[Removed] - Start and Stop buttons - listbox - some comments [Added] - Working DataGridBox - class leerling and a list of leerlingen - animated the start button - made MakeLeeling() (Changed the qr format to Naam;Voornaam;Klas) - Renamed main form to Main because Form1 was dumb
-Added a DataGrid with leerlingen -Added Visual button to start [not finished]
- Added icone for settingsform - Replaced Combobox with a listbox - changed close button text to Confirm because it seamed more logic
Selectionne la premiere camera par defaut
[FIX] programme ne crash plus quand il ne detecte pas de code QR
Ajout d'un timer qui prends un photo a chaque tick
Suppression du bouton "Config". Configuration se fait automatiquement quand le form est initialisé.
Changé le nom de la fenetre et ajout d'une icone
